item.title: Hacking Clemson University
item.description: This article details the steps I took to discover and exploit an SQL injection vulnerability on the Clemson University website using my own tool, SQLiF (SQL injection Finder). DISCLAIMER This post and the release of my tool, SQLiF, are intended for educational purposes only. I was previously granted permission from Clemson University to document and share my findings with others. I am not responsible for anything you do with the information presented within this post.
